001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.ClosedSolutionOptimizer;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.UnaryEstimationFunction;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
015
016import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Map;
019
020public class TrainingSetSize {
021
022    public static <N extends Number> void main(String[] args) {
023        List<JavaNumberTypeSupport<?>> types = List.of(JavaNumberTypeSupport.RATIONAL_BIGINT);
024
025        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME");
026        mrePlot.display();
027
028        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Fit vs Training Set Size");
029        UnaryEstimationFunction<Double> targetFit = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE).getEstimationFunction();
030        fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(targetFit, "Target");
031        fitPlot.setYRange(-2.0, 2.0);
032        fitPlot.display();
033
034        for (int trainingSetSize = 10; trainingSetSize <= 500; trainingSetSize += trainingSetSize > 90 ? 100 : 10) {
035            for (JavaNumberTypeSupport<?> type : types) {
036                LinearRegression<N> regression = getFittedFunction(type, trainingSetSize);
037                LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model = regression.fitComplexity(9);
038                fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(model, "Fit " + type.name());
039                Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regression.calculateRMEs(model);
040                mrePlot.addToSeries(type.name() + " Train RME", new float[]{trainingSetSize}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
041                for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
042                    mrePlot.addToSeries(type.name() + " " + currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME", new float[]{trainingSetSize}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
043                }
044            }
045            fitPlot.getChart().setTitle("Training Set Size = " + trainingSetSize);
046            fitPlot.redraw();
047            mrePlot.redraw();
048        }
049    }
050
051    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
052    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> getFittedFunction(JavaNumberTypeSupport<?> typeSupport, int trainingSetSize) {
053        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typedTypeSupport = (JavaNumberTypeSupport<N>) typeSupport;
054        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typedTypeSupport);
055        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typedTypeSupport);
056        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator, trainingSetSize);
057    }
058
059    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator, int trainingSetSize) {
060        dataSetGenerator.setRandomSeed(165);
061        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.2f);
062        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(trainingSetSize);
063        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(1000);
064        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
065        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
066        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, new ClosedSolutionOptimizer<>(basisFunctionGenerator.getNumberTypeSupport()), Regimes.oneShot());
067    }
068
069}
